response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product is not just an item; it's an investment in excellence and functionality. Given its unique features and the value it offers, I believe it would significantly enhance your daily experience. Considering its worth and the benefits it provides, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $12,000. This price reflects the superior craftsmanship, materials used, and the exclusivity of the product. I trust that you will find its value far exceeding the cost. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.", "product_price": 12000}
